about.title: Who are we?
about.text1: We are a Latin American educational tourism agency designed for Latinos, with over 7 years of experience.
about.text2: Our headquarters is in Dublin, Ireland, and we have more than 20 representatives from different nationalities to assist you in various parts of the world.
about.text3: Our community already includes +3,000 travellers who chose us to live this experience and grow professionally.
about.text4: We go beyond just recommending a school. We have lived the experience and know what you need to make your journey abroad a success.
